paper_abstract: This paper aims to solve the problem of minimizing a linear objective function subject to a max-T fuzzy relational equation constraint, with T a continuous t-norm. This study makes two contributions. First, two extensions are given based on the results in Fang et al., where the max-min or max-product fuzzy relational equation constraint is considered. Second, a procedure for solving optimization problems with the max-Archimedean t-norm, fuzzy relational equation constraint is provided. A numerical example is provided to illustrate the procedure. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All fights reserved.
paper_title: Minimizing a linear objective function under a max-t-norm fuzzy relational equation constraint
